casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

February 11, 2014

[Cite as 2HH14 Case Announcements, 2014-Ohio-454.]

*1406MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2013-1551. Clareshire Court Condominium Unit Owners’ Assn. v. Montilla.

Cuyahoga App. No. 97024, 2013-Ohio-3911.

This cause came on for further consideration upon the filing of appellant’s motion for emergency injunction. It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
